channel.title: registry_event on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in registry_event on My New Hugo Site

item.title: COM Hijack via Sdclt
item.description: Detects changes to ‘HKCU\Software\Classes\Folder\shell\open\command\DelegateExecute’

item.title: Suspicious New Printer Ports in Registry (CVE-2020-1048)
item.description: Detects a new and suspicious printer port creation in Registry that could be an attempt to exploit CVE-2020-1048

item.title: Windows Registry Persistence COM Search Order Hijacking
item.description: Detects potential COM object hijacking leveraging the COM Search Order

item.title: Windows Registry Trust Record Modification
item.description: Alerts on trust record modification within the registry, indicating usage of macros

item.title: Windows Credential Editor Registry
item.description: Detects the use of Windows Credential Editor (WCE)

item.title: Autorun Keys Modification
item.description: Detects modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry

item.title: Possible Privilege Escalation via Service Permissions Weakness
item.description: Detect modification of services configuration (ImagePath, FailureCommand and ServiceDLL) in registry by processes with Medium integrity level

item.title: Windows Registry Persistence COM Key Linking
item.description: Detects COM object hijacking via TreatAs subkey

item.title: Narrator's Feedback-Hub Persistence
item.description: Detects abusing Windows 10 Narrator’s Feedback-Hub

item.title: RDP Registry Modification
item.description: Detects potential malicious modification of the property value of fDenyTSConnections and UserAuthentication to enable remote desktop connections.

item.title: DLL Load via LSASS
item.description: Detects a method to load DLL via LSASS process using an undocumented Registry key

item.title: Suspicious Keyboard Layout Load
item.description: Detects the keyboard preload installation with a suspicious keyboard layout, e.g. Chinese, Iranian or Vietnamese layout load in user session on systems maintained by US staff only

item.title: OceanLotus Registry Activity
item.description: Detects registry keys created in OceanLotus (also known as APT32) attacks

item.title: Usage of Sysinternals Tools
item.description: Detects the usage of Sysinternals Tools due to accepteula key being added to Registry

item.title: Registry Persistence via Explorer Run Key
item.description: Detects a possible persistence mechanism using RUN key for Windows Explorer and pointing to a suspicious folder

item.title: CMSTP Execution
item.description: Detects various indicators of Microsoft Connection Manager Profile Installer execution

item.title: Registry Persistence Mechanisms
item.description: Detects persistence registry keys

item.title: Sticky Key Like Backdoor Usage
item.description: Detects the usage and installation of a backdoor that uses an option to register a malicious debugger for built-in tools that are accessible in the login screen

item.title: New RUN Key Pointing to Suspicious Folder
item.description: Detects suspicious new RUN key element pointing to an executable in a suspicious folder

item.title: DHCP Callout DLL Installation
item.description: Detects the installation of a Callout DLL via CalloutDlls and CalloutEnabled parameter in Registry, which can be used to execute code in context of the DHCP server (restart required)

item.title: UAC Bypass via Event Viewer
item.description: Detects UAC bypass method using Windows event viewer

item.title: UAC Bypass via Sdclt
item.description: Detects changes to HKCU:\Software\Classes\exefile\shell\runas\command\isolatedCommand

item.title: COMPlus_ETWEnabled Registry Modification
item.description: Potential adversaries stopping ETW providers recording loaded .NET assemblies.

item.title: DNS ServerLevelPluginDll Install
item.description: Detects the installation of a plugin DLL via ServerLevelPluginDll parameter in Registry, which can be used to execute code in context of the DNS server (restart required)

item.title: Leviathan Registry Key Activity
item.description: Detects registry key used by Leviathan APT in Malaysian focused campaign

item.title: Logon Scripts (UserInitMprLogonScript) Registry
item.description: Detects creation or execution of UserInitMprLogonScript persistence method

item.title: Office Security Settings Changed
item.description: Detects registry changes to Office macro settings

item.title: Pandemic Registry Key
item.description: Detects Pandemic Windows Implant

item.title: RDP Sensitive Settings Changed
item.description: Detects changes to RDP terminal service sensitive settings

item.title: RedMimicry Winnti Playbook Registry Manipulation
item.description: Detects actions caused by the RedMimicry Winnti playbook

item.title: Suspicious Camera and Microphone Access
item.description: Detects Processes accessing the camera and microphone from suspicious folder

item.title: Suspicious RUN Key from Download
item.description: Detects the suspicious RUN keys created by software located in Download or temporary Outlook/Internet Explorer directories
